title: Tarrasa, XII
provenance_text:
Adja Yunkers [1900-1983], New York, NY; Women's Committee, Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 488, illustrated in the catalogue, plate 115) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. The painting was purchased from the International by the Women's Committee of the Department of Fine Arts, as a gift to Carnegie Institute. It was accessioned on December 17, 1958.

creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
